hero.headline: Japanese precision, Hungarian craftsmanship — premium car care in Odorheiu Secuiesc.
hero.text: Full exterior and interior cleaning, upholstery care, and detailed treatment at the highest level.

about.title: About P-Line Car Detail
about.text: P-Line Car Detail stands for a philosophy: Japanese precision, Hungarian expertise, and Székely passion. With experience gained in Hungary, my goal is to bring premium, personalized car care to Odorheiu Secuiesc.

service1.name: Exterior Wash
service1.desc: Thorough, multi-step hand wash using premium products and techniques.

service2.name: Interior Cleaning
service2.desc: Cleaning of upholstery, dashboard, and interior components from dust and dirt.

service3.name: Upholstery Cleaning
service3.desc: Deep cleaning and stain removal on fabric and leather surfaces.

service4.name: Engine Bay Premium Care
service4.desc: Gentle cleaning and protection of all engine bay components.

service5.name: Wheel Surface Treatment
service5.desc: Cleaning, conditioning, and protective coating for lasting shine and easier maintenance.

service6.name: Door Frame Detailing
service6.desc: Thorough cleaning of door frames and hinges, followed by protective treatment.

service7.name: Iron & Rust Particle Removal
service7.desc: Gentle chemical removal of embedded metal and rust particles from paint surfaces.

service8.name: Upholstery Care
service8.desc: Leather and fabric treatment with UV-resistant, long-lasting protection layer.

service9.name: Durable Wax Coating
service9.desc: Long-lasting, water-repellent wax for deep gloss and extended surface protection.

service10.name: Exterior Care
service10.desc: Ceramic shampoo treatment that refreshes existing protection and enhances shine.

service11.name: Interior Care
service11.desc: UV-resistant glossy protective layer for dashboard and interior surfaces.

service12.name: Custom Solutions
service12.desc: Tailored car care services based on your specific needs.

faq1.q: How long does a full cleaning take?
faq1.a: On average 1–2 hours, depending on vehicle size and condition.

faq2.q: How long does a full treatment take?
faq2.a: On average between 15-30 minutes depending on the service.

faq3.a: I work with Koch Chemie — German-made, premium-grade detailing products.

faq4.a: I use BIGBOI professional detailing equipment, made by detailers for detailers.

faq5.q: Do you take photos or videos?
faq5.a: Yes, I document every service with Before/After photos or videos, even for regular clients.

faq6.a: Of course. I offer a 24-hour satisfaction guarantee from handover.

faq7.a: If any residue remains, I re-clean the affected area free of charge.

faq8.a: Absolutely. Polishing and ceramic coating will be available in the near future.

faq9.q: Do I need to leave my car?
faq9.a: It depends on the service — for larger jobs yes, for smaller ones you may wait on-site.
